title: FRQ Score
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

General Considerations:

For Task A, the response must correctly describe one difference in the age structure of China compared to that of Nigeria.

For Task B, the response must correctly describe one governmental policy that influenced the age structure in China.

For Task C, the response must correctly describe one economic consequence of the age structure of Nigeria.

For Task D, the response must correctly describe one economic consequence of the age structure of China.

For Task E, the response must correctly explain a political consequence of having a disproportionately younger population structure.

The points for each task are earned independently of each other.
descriptions: The response accomplishes none of the five of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes one of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes two of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes three of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes four of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes all five of the tasks set by the question.
